post_title: What district are we staying in?

comments.author: sebastianelisa
comments.body: The middle two numbers of the post code in the address are the district and since that is 1090 according to Google maps you're in the 9th district Alsergrund

comments.author: Julesvernevienna
comments.body: Almost everything is in "walking distance" from there. You will be adjacent to the old town, you will have lots of trams you can use right in front of your doorstep, you will have a subway which brings you further outside.

comments.author: --akai--
comments.body:
9th, but also basically directly at the borders to 1st and 8th. It's very central. 

Just look at google maps for restaurant near it. We know neither what type of restaurant you like, nor what you would consider walking distance (you could technically cross the whole 1st district within 2 km)

comments.author: Pronationbig
comments.body: Just go to the Servitengasse (top 5 of the most beautiful streets in Vienna) :)

comments.author: youremymymymylover
comments.body: Worth mentioning right on the edge of 8 and 1 as well
